tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A journey of trust, faith and care. Dr. Soni Anand is an epitome of love and affection.  Me and my husband visited her for pregnancy issues.She is god for me ...  carrying positivity. Our each visit to her clinic  was nothing less than pleasant experience. I got my son on 7 December through c section because of her believes .. when I lose all hope after 4 recurrent miscarriages. She was the one who gave confidence with every possible treatment.  She turned my dream come true. I was very afraid of operation and hospital stay but all my fear vanished when she smile and said I am always be there for you. All things went smoothly and I came home happily with my bundle of joy.  I strongly recommend everyone to Dr Soni Anand. Thank you so much Soni mam. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. God bless you and your family. You made my life.
Love you üòò from Priya, PRIYANSh and Ramesh

review: I still remember the day when I first met the doctor after my pregnancy was confirmed. I was very nervous but the doctor has helped me and made me strong both physically and mentally to deal with pregnancy and ultimately delivery. Now , I am blessed with a beautiful little princess. A big thankuu to the Doctor for guiding us through this journey. Surely recommend her to everyone. Thanks once again.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I didn't got a satisfactory treatment. *** ********* **** *** **** ** *** ******* ******* ** ** *** **** * **** ** *** *** ******** **** ****** **** **** ***** ****** **** ***** ********* *** the medications she is prescribing are not available at any chemist store so you have to take the medicines from her clinic only which i think is not correct.
reply_text:
Hi 
I prescribed u corectia -M tab , Absolut woman n a surprise for correction of ur mensturation disturbances , I can challenge you that these medications r freely available n r of Pharmed company . No body forced u to buy medicines from in-house pharmacy,
Most  Patients thank us for all facilities under one roof but I guess patients like u like to roam around , ur choice
Secondly we doctors give treatment under more or less fixed protocols which we change accordingly, hormonal imbalances r not easy to treat ok , u cannot get miracle in one or two visits , 
It is a norm nowadays to criticise treating doctors who r working in difficult covid times. 
Hope u get a better doctor n I request Practo to provide doctors to rate their patients coz some r impossible....

tags: Value for money,
review: ** **** ***** ***** ** ******** **  *********  ******* A day before delivery of my wife she refused to operate in saroj hospital and bhagwati hospital  in Rohini New Delhi due to covid she told us I will operate in Shalimar bagh MAX only and only if you do not have budget then go to GOVT hospital.
reply_text:
I m so sorry  for ur inconvenience .... but i m quite flexible regarding admission of patients ....
Keeping the current covid senario I suppose better equipped hospital like Max is always preferred.....
I hope i was helpful during ur infertility treatment and pregnancy.... please don‚Äôt put money to blame n ruin relationships 
I still wish you n ur newborn all the best in life ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Me and my gf, visited ma'am as we were really scared about a contraceptive failure and were paranoid that my gf might be pregnant. Not gonna lie i was really paranoid and felt as if everything happening pointed towards her being pregnant. Then we contacted ma'am and believe me if you do the same you'll not have to worry about anything, as she is no less then an angel. She was so supportive and was beyond any of our expectations. The in house Pharmacy and tests also came in handy as we being young and unmarried didn't know what to expect at unknown places. If you ask me going to her, if you are nervous and don't know who to reach out to might be one of your best choices. She made us, an unmarried and young couple feel at home when everybody judged us and tried to use us. Thank you ma'am.
reply_text:
Thanks that I was helpful to u both
Always remember that being adults u have got rights but be safe n be responsible for each other n for ur Heath 
I was doing my job sincerely 
Thanks again dear
